text: Best game ever, best OST ever
author: Louis Claudel

text: Hey SupraDarky. I wanted to say thanks. The day before you uploaded this song, I subscribed to you. I watched this video and immediately fell in love. This led me to buy the game online right on the spot just for the music. I played it to the end and now it's one of my most favorite RPGs. It was a great game and it's funny to me that if you didn't decide to upload this video, I wouldn't have been able to experience a story and OST so beautiful and grand. So thank you!
author: Phystri

text: Regarding slow videos, I had a similar thing where the video would take 10 second breaks every 45 seconds of play time. Not the best thing to happen with an almost two hour long video. I'm running Chrome and deleting browsing history, cache and cookies seems to have done the trick.
author: Hefaestos

text: Nier!  The soundtrack is always so great.
author: madamminalost

text:
Yeah, some videos have been loading on a sort of delay. If I wait about thirty seconds to a minute, the video's buffer will jump ahead to where it should've been, but I won't be able to play the video until that happens.
~
This track is nice -- just some soothing guitar picking to relax to. I've yet to play NieR, though.
author: MishtahPoog

text: I liked this game. It wasn't the best game ever or anything, but the story, characters, and music were really good. Grimoire Weiss ruled.
author: daneofurexistence

text: You're not alone, I'm having problems too because the videos often won't start playing; in the past I've never had trouble though, and because of this it makes listening to music harder. Anyway, thanks for doing what you do, I've been a fan for years.

text: That happened with me on a few videos. I thought it was a wireless issue, but now that I think about it, everything else was loading perfectly...
author: Jirt

text: Anyone else having problems with YouTube's video player lately? Sometimes I have to refresh for the video to start playing (I use Firefox). Anyways, today's Father's Day so I thought it would be fitting to upload a track from this game. Nier is a great father to Yonah, trying to find a cure for her disease by any means necessary. His quest makes for a great story full of emotions.
author: SupraDarky
